item.title: Visualizing large graphs and AI embeddings with ease
item.description:
Description

Cosmograph, a high-performance web framework for creating interactive graph visualizations, is now accessible to Python engineers directly from their notebooks!Powered by cosmos.gl (the fastest and open source JavaScript library for Network Graph visualizations library) and DuckDB, Cosmograph handles millions of points with GPU-accelerated, force-directed layouts, enabling real-time exploration of massive multidimensional and graph data.

For more information, see https://pybay.org/

Follow us on LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/company/pybay
item.dc:creator: Nikita Rokotyan
